translations: 侯爵；侯爵长子的尊称（等于 marquis）

sentences.sentence: He was conferred marquess by the king.
It was time to own up to her lies, to confess her deceit to The Marauding Marquess.
sentences.translation: 清算一切的日子到了，是时候坦白她的谎言了，是时候承认自己对“劫匪侯爵”的欺骗了。

sentences.sentence: Contributions to the Ornithology of South China Part II (by the Marquess Hachisuka, Ph. D.)
sentences.translation: 对华南鸟类学的贡献。之二。蜂须贺侯爵(博士)文。
